title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument wants to help you stay connected to what's happening at the monument. We routinely update our events calendar, news releases, and social media sites with the most current information.                    News Releases Find our current press releases here, updated regularly.          Social Media Here's a full list of all the other places you can find us on the web!          Press Kit   Here you will find information highlighting some of the main features of WWII Valor in the Pacific National Monument and links to galleries of high resolution photos for use by the media. Please credit photos "NPS Photo."          Contact Public Affairs Here's how to get in touch with us.
